entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Local drifting snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
